data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Abkhazia.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Abkhazia, Georgia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Abkhazia, Georgia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Abkhazia, Georgia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Abkhazia that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Bezhta people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Bezhta people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Bezhta people is yours.
Lord, make the 3,294 believers in Abkhazia to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 239,606 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 3,294 believers in Abkhazia, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 242,900 people living in Abkhazia through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
